      • checkUpperLeftCorner

        public void checkUpperLeftCorner(int state,
                                 int w,
                                 int h,
                                 Cellule[][] c)
        Method to check the neighbors of the cellule situated in the upper left corner of the grille.
        Parameters:
        state - all the neighbors state will be compared to this
        w - width of the grille
        h - height of the grille
        c - the matrix of cellules that represents the grille

      • checkMiddle

        public void checkMiddle(int state,
                        Cellule[][] c)
        Method to check the state of the neighbors for the cellules situated in the middle and whose neighbors aren't situated outside the limits of the grille. For each neighbor, we compare it's state and the state sent to the method, if the states are the same, the attribute noNeighbors is increased by one, counting the neighbors that have the same state as the one received in the method.
        Parameters:
        state - all the neighbors state will be compared to this
        c - the matrix of cellules that represents the grille

      • checkNeighbors

        public void checkNeighbors(int state,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           Cellule[][] c,
                           Cellule[][] n)
        Method used to check the coordinates of a cellule, and according to them, the proper method to check her neighbors is used, after the counting of the neighbors is done, the method validateNeighbors is called.
        Parameters:
        state -
        width -
        height -
        c -
        n -
